title: Juventus legend Gianluigi Buffon very nearly joined Barcelona over the Serie A giants, reveals his agent
text:
Juventus legend Gianluigi Buffon very nearly joined Barcelona over the Serie A giants, reveals his agent Can you imagine seeing Buffon in anything other than a Juventus kit? Share Gianluigi Buffon very nearly signed for Barcelona, according to his agent (Photo: AFP/Getty) Share Get     
There are no two words about it, Gianluigi Buffon is a Juventus legend. 
Yes, he started his career at Parma, but after signing for the Old Lady back in 2001, the towering Italian hasn't looked back. 
The 39-year-old has won the Serie A title a staggering seven times with Juventus. He's lifted the Italian Super Cup with them five times, and won the Italian Cup twice. 
Today, the sheer idea of him in another kit would just be wrong, but according to his agent, things could have been very different. Buffon has won the Serie A title seven times with Juventus (Photo: Getty) The Italian could have been playing at the Nou Camp (Photo: Action Images via Reuters) Buffon celebrates with the Serie A trophy in 2015 (Photo: Getty) 
Speaking to TuttoJuve, Buffon's agent Silvano Martina revealed the Italy legend very nearly signed for a certain Catalan team. 
"Yes, it was close," said Martina. "There was an agreement between Parma and Barcelona, but he picked Juventus."
